skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: n. l. e. c. worship
Developer Terms of Use
des:
NLEC Worship with Larry Rice is more than a worship experience. It is the revolutionary empowerment event whose participants are society’s rejects, the poor, fatherless, and homeless, but who are finding hope through the revolutionary Gospel of Jesus Christ to the extent that they are able to reach out through the work of New Life Evangelistic Center as leaders in the fields of broadcasting, renewable energy, and direct help services to others who are in need. 

Larry Rice was born in McAllen, Texas in 1949 where he graduated from Sharyland High School in 1967. He attended Concordia College in Austin, Texas and Concordia Senior College in Fort Wayne, Indiana where he received his BA Degree in Theology and Social Psychology in May 1971. Larry Rice was ordained through Calvary Temple in Fort Wayne on December 12, 1971. In 1987 he was honored with a Doctor of Divinity Degree from McKendree College in Lebanon, Illinois.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
